About • Intreen 
  
 
    
   

 About Intreen 
 
   The All‑in‑One Business Marketplace Ecosystem 
   Intreen unifies commerce, people, knowledge, and events into a single platform. 
 
 
     Marketplace  Multi‑vendor shops, catalog, and analytics.   
     Events  Create, promote, and ticket your events.   
     E‑Learning  Courses for customers and teams.   
     Directory  Profiles, listings, and advertising.   
 
 
   About This Site 
    Gage Milner — Site Developer / Admin.  Deployed with a self‑hosted API and modular front‑end architecture. Dynamic islands power the cart, search, and admin. Iterative rollout across marketplace, events, and LMS.
